LanguageData.GSSFDBH_Atmospheric: Atmospheric Water Station (Apply on save load)
LanguageData.GSSFDBH_AtmosphericIsTreated: Count as a treated water source
LanguageData.GSSFDBH_AtmosphericYieldPowered: Water produced per station per day when powered
LanguageData.GSSFDBH_AtmosphericYieldUnpowered: Water produced per station per day when not powered
LanguageData.GSSFDBH_Tank: Compressed Water Tank (Apply on save load)
LanguageData.GSSFDBH_Patch: Game must be restarted for patches to be enabled or disabled.
LanguageData.GSSFDBH_PatchEvent: Patch contamination event to never trigger when water source is treated
LanguageData.GSSFDBH_PatchTowers: Patch water towers to show as treated when all water sources are Atmospheric Water Station
LanguageData.GSSFDBH_PatchPlumbingNet: Patch plumbing net to support non-static water storage
